Label: LABEL
Definition: A definition

Label: Identity
Definition: Identity and contact information

Label: Demographic Info
Definition: Demographic characteristics: sex, age, ethnicity, marital status, education

Label: Family members
Definition: Characteristics of relatives in the household

Label: Residence
Definition: The residential area (urban/rural), structure of the house, and duration of residing in the house

Label: Water and fuel source
Definition: Water source, heat and fuel system, and cooking method

Label: Job
Definition: The names of all jobs the participant has had and the duration of work

Label: Food preservation and cooking
Definition: Food preservation, frying, boiling, BBQ, steaming, ‚Ä¶

Label: Properties
Definition: Transferable and non-transferable belongings and wealth score (Multiple Correspondence Analysis)

Label: Medical History
Definition: Suffering from any disease at the baseline of cohort

Label: Chief complaints
Definition: The complaints of participants from their physical or mental sufferings

Label: Cancer History
Definition: History of cancer, site, and age diagnosed in the participant or any of his/her relatives

Label: Smoking
Definition: Ever or current smoker, age of use, type, number per day and days per week

Label: Opium use
Definition: Ever or current user, age and route of use, type, time per day and days per week

Label: Alcohol use
Definition: Ever or current user, age of use, type, quantity per episode and episodes per month

Label: Drug history (1)
Definition: The main created categories of drugs consumed by participants

Label: Drug History (2)
Definition: The exact name, duration, dose, and frequency of drugs consumed

Label: Oral health
Definition: Decayed, filled, and missing teeth along with the age of the participant in each of these occasions

Label: Tea
Definition: Tea temperature, type of tea, and type of habit for drinking the tea

Label: Physical activity
Definition: The duration and intensity of physical activities during working and leasure times of the day, and Metabolic Equivalent Task (MET)

Label: Animal contact
Definition: The age of the participant in contact with animals, the duration and intensity of animal contact, and the type of animal

Label: Anthropometric measurements
Definition: Physically measured height, weight, waist circumference, hip circumference and data of pictogram

Label: Blood pressure measurements
Definition: Both systolic and diastolic blood pressure measured in sitting position twice from each arm

Label: Food Frequency Questionnaire
Definition: Units of food categories consumed per day

Label: Lab markers
Definition: Biochemical markers

Label: PID
Definition: The Unique Id for eatch participant

Definition: The first name of participant.

Definition: Specifies the participant cumulative use, first history
Formula: If type of tobacoo was cigar =( (Duration1*365.25)*NumPerDay1)/20
